Title: Cross Creek
Actors: Mary Steenburgen, Rip Torn, Peter Coyote
Plot: In the 1930s, Marjorie Kinnan Rawlings moves to Florida's backwaters to write in peace. She feels bothered by affectionate men, editor and confused neighbors, but soon she connects and writes The Yearling, a classic of American li...
Awards: Nominated for 4 Oscars. 2 wins & 7 nominations total
